title: VOTE!
body: <p>Tomorrow is November 2nd, don't forget to <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/09/09/vote_or_not_org_win_one_hundred_thousand_dollars_for_voting.aspx" title="vote!">VOTE</a>! Even if you don't live in a swing state your vote still counts. I don't care who you vote for (see image below), just don't forget to vote. </p><p><a href="http://www.votenader.org" title="Vote Nader!"><img src="http://www.votenader.org/img/red_states3.jpg" alt="Red States for Ralph" /></a><br /><a href="http://www.votenader.org/why_ralph/index.php?cid=170" title="20 reasons to vote Nader">Why I'm voting for Ralph</a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-11-01

VOTE!
